segments.text: I see the kitchen scene with the sink gushing water over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens on the floor, lapping at the woman's shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, towel bunched up, eyes on her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No sign she knows about the flood behind her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs precariously on the tilting stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar's open, and he's pulling out goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He balances a plate like it's part of the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him gestures for her turn at the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of sibling cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden through the window is all neat bushes and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are pulled back, letting in the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, water damage and fall risks loom large.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to this mess?
segments.speaker: PAR
